get.description: Returns test runs based on the filter specified. Returns all runs of the tenant if there is no filter.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for the test run. Names are not unique. Test runs with same name are assigned sequential rolling numbers.

parameters.name: requestedBy
parameters.description: Filter by the user who requested the test run. Here requestedBy should be the display name of the user.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by the test run status.

parameters.name: runType
parameters.description: Valid values include: null, one of TestRunType, or "*"

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter by the test runs that have been modified after the fromDate timestamp.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter by the test runs that have been modified before the toDate timestamp.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Include the detailed test run attributes.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The maximum number of test runs to return.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the test run

parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: groupNames
parameters.description: Comma separated names of counter groups, such as 'Application', 'Performance' and 'Throughput'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter for the particular type of errors.

parameters.name: subType
parameters.description: Filter for a particular subtype of errors. You should not provide error subtype without error type.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: To include the details of test errors such as messagetext, request, stacktrace, testcasename, scenarioname, and lasterrordate.

createdBy.description: User that created the agent group

groupName.description: The name of the agent group

storageName.description: Identifier for the storage (eg. table name)

storageType.description: Type of the store (table, queue, blob)

applicationId.description: Unique Id of the Application Component

name.description: The Name of the Application component

path.description: Path identifier of the Application component

pathSeperator.description: Character used to separate paths for counters

type.description: Type identifier of the Application component under test

applicationId.description: The unique Id of the Application that the counter belongs

id.description: The unique Id for the AutCounter

isDefault.description: Whether the autCounter is a default counter or not

path.description: The Path of the the autcounter wrt to hierarchy

autPortalLink.description: The link that points to aut results site

isEnabled.description: true if application results collection is enabled for this tenant

maxComponentsAllowedForCollection.description: the max no. of application components allowed for collection per run

maxCountersAllowed.description: The max no. of counters that can be collected per aut

counterInstanceId.description: The instanceId for which samples are required

maxBatchSize.description: Maximum number of samples returned in this object

sasKey.description: The SaSkey to use for the drop.

staticMachines.description: Static machines configured for local runs

validGeoLocations.description: The list of valid geo-lcations for tenant

loadGenerationGeoLocations.description: Geo location from where load is generated

accessData.description: Data for accessing the drop and not persisted in storage
Data for accessing the drop and not persisted in storage

createdDate.description: Time at which the drop is created

loadTestDefinition.description: LoadTest definition of the run for which testdrop is created

TestDropRef.description: An abstracted reference to some other resource. This class is used to provide the load test data contracts with a uniform way to reference other resources in a way that provides easy traversal through links.

url.description: Full http link to the resource

cloudLoadTestSolutionUrl.description: The uri to the test run results file.

resultsUrl.description: The uri to the test run results file.

abortMessage.description: Message associated to state change, contains details of infrastructure error.

autInitializationError.description: true if aut counter collection could not start due to some critical error for this run.

chargeable.description: Whether run is chargeable or not Its chargeable once we configured agent and sent start signal

chargedVUserminutes.description: Whether run is chargeable or not The Charged VUser Minutes for the RUN

executionFinishedDate.description: Gets the time when the test run execution finished

executionStartedDate.description: Gets the time when the test run warmup finished(if warmup was specified) and load test started

queuedDate.description: Gets the time when the test run was queued

runSourceUrl.description: The uri to the run source.

startedBy.description: Vss User identity who created the test run.

startedDate.description: When the test run started execution.

stoppedBy.description: Vss User identity who created the test run.

subState.description: SubState is more granular description of the state

testDrop.description: Drop associated with this test run

testSettings.description: The Test settings for the test run

warmUpStartedDate.description: Gets the time when the test run warmup started

webResultUrl.description: The uri to the vso detailed result.

createdBy.description: Vss User identity who created the test run.

createdDate.description: Gets the creation time of the test run

deletedBy.description: Vss User identity who deleted the test run.

deletedDate.description: Gets the deleted time of the test run

finishedDate.description: Gets the finish time of the test run

id.description: Gets the unique identifier for the test run definition.

loadTestFileName.description: Gets the load test file of the test run definition.

name.description: Gets the name of the test run definition.

runNumber.description: Gets the number of the test run (unique within a tenant)

runSource.description: Test run source like Ibiza,VSO,BuildVNext, etc.

runType.description: Run type like VisualStudioLoadTest or JMeterLoadTest

counterName.description: Name of the counter Eg: Errors/Sec

counterUnits.description: Units for this counter. Empty string for mere numbers

isPreselectedCounter.description: true if this counter instance is a default counter

machineName.description: Machine from where this counter was collected Used in case of machine specific counters like - Agent CPU and memory etc.

partOfCounterGroups.description: Counter Groups to which this counter instance is part of

summaryData.description: Summary result for this counter instance

uniqueName.description: A unique name for this counter instance

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

WebApiUserLoadTestMachineInput.description: This can eventually evolve as the ultimate JSON file that user can use to configure their machine(s) against CLT

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '6.0-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '6.0-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.
